Package goal.tools

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResultInspector<C extends Controller>
    This is a interface for a inspector callback function for a result of a SingleRun.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRun<D extends Debugger,C extends GOALInterpreter<D>>
    Abstract run can be used to run a MASProgram.
    BatchRun
    A Batch will run a batch of MASPrograms a repeated number of times.
    BreakpointManager
    Manages all breakpoints set by a user in a file.
    IDEAgentFactory  
    IDEDebugger  
    IDEGOALInterpreter  
    LaunchManager  
    MyMASRunner  
    PlatformManager
    FIXME: This class should not be needed.
    Run
    Command line utility to run multi-agent systems and tests.
    SingleRun
    A single run of a MASProgram.
    UnitTestRun
    Runs a UnitTest program.
    UnitTestRunResultInspector
    Inspects the results of a RunTest.
